sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPUNGING, in gunnery, the cleaning of the inside of a gun with a ſpunge, in order to prevent any ſparks of fire from remaining in it, which would endanger the life of him that ſhould load it again.
SPUN-yarn, among sailors, is a kind of line made from rope yarn, and uſed for ſeizing or faſtening things together.
